<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from display_value="Run Server Side Script">55e009791b1cdc90a89720a8ec4bcb9a</copied_from><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>6</order><snapshot/><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-26 11:41:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>b118af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_b118af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-30 10:21:34</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="DevTools - GetRolesFromUser">6118af33db79ac90ba15a35305961910</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=b118af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>b118af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-26 11:41:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>7d18af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-26 16:11:24</sys_updated_on><value>var strLog = '';
function Log(strText)
{
	strLog = strLog + "\n" + strText;
}
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var bResult = true;
	

	function TestCase_GetRolesFromUser(vInput, vExpected)
	{
		Log('TestCase_GetRolesFromUser');
		Log('Input: '+RenderValue(vInput));
		Log('Expected: '+RenderValue(vExpected));
		var vResult = GetRolesFromUser(vInput);
		Log('Result  : '+RenderValue(vResult));
		if (!IsEqual(vResult,vExpected,true))
		{
			bResult = false;
			Log('Test case FAILED');
		}
		Log('');
	}
	
	
	var strUserAlice = GetRecordFromTestStep('bd18af33db79ac90ba15a3530596196a');
	var strUserBob = GetRecordFromTestStep('f118af33db79ac90ba15a35305961970');
	var strUserCharlie = GetRecordFromTestStep('b918af33db79ac90ba15a35305961974');
	var strRoleUser = GetRecordFromTestStep('cac86f73db79ac90ba15a353059619c6');
	var strRoleManager = GetRecordFromTestStep('b0492bb3db79ac90ba15a35305961973');
	var strRoleAdmin = GetRecordFromTestStep('7f79ebb3db79ac90ba15a35305961911');

	
	Log('An empty user has no roles');
	TestCase_GetRolesFromUser('',[]);
	
	Log('User Alice has the USER role');
	TestCase_GetRolesFromUser(strUserAlice,[strRoleUser]);

	Log('User Bob has the USER and the MANAGER role');
	TestCase_GetRolesFromUser(strUserBob,[strRoleUser,strRoleManager]);
	
	Log('User Charlie has all roles');
	TestCase_GetRolesFromUser(strUserCharlie,[strRoleUser,strRoleManager,strRoleAdmin]);
		
	stepResult.setOutputMessage(strLog);
	return bResult;
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>b118af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-26 11:41:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>b918af33db79ac90ba15a3530596198e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-26 11:41:53</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
